data.title: Rahul Mahajan's ex-wife Dimpy Ganguly welcomes her second child with husband Rohit Roy on Easter eve
data.meta_description: Rahul Mahajan's ex-wife Dimpy Ganguly gave birth to a baby boy with her husband Rohit Roy. She has named her baby prince as Aryaan Roy. Check out the whole story to find out more.
data.text:
Rahul Mahajan's ex-wife Dimpy Ganguly had married a Dubai-based businessman Rohit Roy in 2015. She gave birth to her first child with him in 2016 and now she has now given us all good news again. She welcomed her second child with Rohit Roy yesterday and it is a baby boy. She named her little prince as Aryaan Roy. Dimpy Ganguly often shares pictures and videos with her first daughter and her husband. She had also announced about her pregnancy in December 2019 on Instagram. Today, she took to Instagram to share the good news about her second baby. She posted a picture of the tiny legs of her baby boy, Aryaan.

Along with the picture, she wrote, "Born on the eve of Easter..my little Bunny Blue is here! ? Aryaan Roy 11.04.2020." Vindu Dara Singh commented on the post and congratulated the parents. He wrote, "So happy what a beautiful day to be born ???Congratulations to all of your family ??" Check out her post here:

Earlier in December 2019, Dimpy had penned down a beautiful message while she announced her second pregnancy. She wrote, "Being a mother has been one of my biggest achievements and I wear it like a badge because I take my job very seriously. I am giving a shape to the future generation, and I feel responsible for it. My role as a nurturer has paid me back in ways I couldn't even imagine. Destiny has decided to bless me yet again and I couldn't have been more happier."

Stay tuned to BollywoodLife for the latest scoops and updates from Bollywood, Hollywood, South, TV and Web-Series.
